metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010083 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The Pallets Project Flask before 1.0 is affected by: unexpected memoryusage. The impact is: denial of service. The attack vector is: craftedencoded JSON data. The fixed version is: 1. NOTE: this may overlapCVE-2018-1000656.

criterions.comment: flask: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
